title: Sneaking up on someone as a stealth champion

replies.body: Wheres your iconic demonic teemo (teemonic?) icon?
pure chaos is better than evil
order over chaos, who says order is good tho, order can be evil

i have no idea how to respond to this because its so fucking true......they dont see you coming you just get this stupid goofy ass look on your face as someone like twitch or something as you pop that ult and give them a heart attack
Remember back in the day where someone would just plop a pink ward down and you'd die from being too close to the enemy?
or when you run circles around someone as the demon in bloodmoon
Yeah, Twitch and Eve are both easy to be horrified or excited on.  No form of panic like being low and invis and the enemy is right outside your view range.
i hope we get a stealth based champ in the future. i know eve is getting a rework but uh... some blue naked wampire woman is not exactly my type of a stealth champ.
